data.title: The School of Greatness
data.meta_description: Listen to Lewis Howes's The School of Greatness podcast with Lewis Howes on Apple Podcasts.
data.text:
The stories you tell yourself on a daily basis determines the person you will become.The good, the bad, the negative, the positive, the uplifting, the draining â theyâre all part of the equation. But YOU are the author of your life story â so, what story are you writing? Top Podcaster & Best-selling Author Lewis Howes brings you the The Daily Motivation Show, where youâll hear from industry-leading experts, youâll learn proven principles, and youâll discover life-changing ideas that will help you get motivated and STAY motivated.

4.8 (811)

SELF-IMPROVEMENT

No matter how ambitious, talented or intelligent you are, youâll only go as far as your habits will take you. And by prioritizing your happiness and emotional well-being in the habits you develop, youâll equip yourself with the tools you need to thrive through anything. But how do we get there? With all the curveballs life throws at us, how can we create positive habits that will bring us peace in times of chaos? In Happy Habits, host Lewis Howes and top experts will show you how to do exactly that. The episodes from this curated feed can be found on The School of Greatness podcast feed or can be accessed ad-free here when you become a GREATNESS+ subscriber.

3.7 (30)

MENTAL HEALTH

Your mindset can be a shield against negativity, or it can be the door that lets it in. And with so much negativity out in the world, if we donât actively shift our focus toward optimism, we run the risk of letting it consume us. So where and how do you start? How can you develop an abundance mindset that will help you attract the life of your dreams? What steps can you take today to begin manifesting a more fulfilled life? In Manifestation & The Law of Attraction, host Lewis Howes and top experts will show you how to do exactly that. The episodes from this curated feed can be found on The School of Greatness podcast feed or can be accessed ad-free here when you become a GREATNESS+ subscriber.

4.3 (20)

SELF-IMPROVEMENT

When you decide to learn the language of money, you begin to unlock abundance in all the areas of your life. Most of us have been taught to approach money from a place of fear â fear of losing it, fear of making too much, fear that we wonât ever make enough. So how do we turn things around? How can we begin to shift our scarcity mindset to one of abundance? How can we stop being afraid to approach our finances head on instead of avoiding them? In Money Mindset, host Lewis Howes and top experts will show you how to do exactly that. The episodes from this curated feed can be found on The School of Greatness podcast feed or can be accessed ad-free here when you become a GREATNESS+ subscriber.

3.2 (23)

INVESTING

When you learn to master your mindset, your entire life starts to change. Your relationships, your career, your health & wellness all begin with taking control of your mind â and not letting your mind control you. But how do you get there? With all of the content and endless tips out in the world, how can you determine what works and what doesnât? How can you continue to try new mindset strategies without getting overwhelmed? In Unlock The Power of Your Mind, host Lewis Howes and top experts will show you how to do exactly that. The episodes from this curated feed can be found on The School of Greatness podcast feed or can be accessed ad-free here when you become a GREATNESS+ subscriber.

3.9 (10)

MENTAL HEALTH

The quality of your relationships determine the quality of your life. You could have everything in the world, but if you have no one to share it with, then whatâs the point? But we canât just snap our fingers and create high-quality, meaningful relationships. It takes consistent, intentional, and dedicated work. It takes us developing valuable skills that will help us become more vulnerable and love deeper. In Lasting Love: Intimacy & Relationships, host Lewis Howes and top experts will show you how to do exactly that. The episodes from this curated feed can be found on The School of Greatness podcast feed or can be accessed ad-free here when you become a GREATNESS+ subscriber.

4.2 (17)

SELF-IMPROVEMENT
